BLOCK.bao: The pit {{pit}} is in kutakatia (is blocked).

CAPTURE.bao_one: {{player}} captured a total of {{count}} stone from the following pits (in order): {{pits}}
CAPTURE.bao_other: {{player}} captured a total of {{count}} stones from the following pits (in order): {{pits}}
CAPTURE.furl: {{player}} captured a stack of size {{size}} at {{where}}.
CAPTURE.gess_one: {{count}} stone is removed from the board.
CAPTURE.gess_other: {{count}} stones are removed from the board.
CAPTURE.meridians: A dead group of size {{count}} is removed.

noperson.group_nowhere: A group of size {{count}} was captured.

CAPTURE.spook_drop_self: {{player}} has 1 of their own ball captured by Spooky below at {{where}}.
CAPTURE.spook_drop_opponent: {{player}} has 1 of their opponent's ball captured by Spooky below at {{where}}.
CAPTURE.spook_lateral_self_one: {{player}} has 1 of their own ball captured by Spooky on the same level at {{where}}.
CAPTURE.spook_lateral_self_other: {{player}} has {{count}} of their own balls captured by Spooky on the same level at {{where}}.
CAPTURE.spook_lateral_opponent_one: {{player}} has 1 of their opponent's ball captured by Spooky on the same level at {{where}}.
CAPTURE.spook_lateral_opponent_other: {{player}} has {{count}} of their opponent's balls captured by Spooky on the same level at {{where}}.
CAPTURE.tumbleweed: {{player}} captured a stack of size {{count}} at {{where}}.
CAPTURE.tumbleweed_self: {{player}} reinforces a stack of size {{count}} at {{where}}.

CLAIM.veletas: Shooter at {{where}} is trapped and is claimed by {{who}}.

CONVERT.courtesan: King and courtesan swapped positions at {{where}}.

DAMAGE.armadas: {{player}}'s ship {{myName}} fired upon the enemy ship named {{theirName}}.

DECLARE.mchess: {{player}} has "called the clock." If no capture is made in the next seven turns, the game will end and be scored.

EOG.consecutive_passes: The game has ended because both players passed consecutively.
EOG.repetition_other: The game has ended because the same position has occurred {{count}} times by the same player.
EOG.repetition_one: The game has ended because the same position has occurred by the same player.
EOG.stalemate: The game has ended because one player has run out of moves.
EOG.tafl_encirclement: The game has ended because the defenders are encircled.
EOG.tafl_exit_fort: The game has ended because the defenders created an exit fort.
EOG.tafl_king_captured: The game has ended because the king was captured.
EOG.tafl_king_escaped: The game has ended because the king escaped.
EOG.susan_nonplacement: The game has ended because no player has placed a piece for 6 plies.
EOG.unlur_foul: The game has ended because one player has achieved the opponent's win condition without achieving their own.

homeworlds.CATASTROPHE: An overpopulation of {{colour}} led to a catastrophe in {{where}}.
homeworlds.CONVERT: {{player}} changed a {{what}} into a {{into}} in the {{where}} system.
homeworlds.DISCOVER: {{player}} discovered a new {{what}} system and named it {{name}}.
homeworlds.ESTABLISH: A {{ship}} colony ship belonging to {{player}} has landed in a {{stars}} system.

MOVE.amazons: {{player}} moved from {{from}} to {{to}} and then blocked off cell {{block}}.
MOVE.anache_dragon: {{player}} moved a group of size {{count}} via a dragon move from {{from}} in the direction {{dir}}.
MOVE.anache_knight: {{player}} moved a group of size {{count}} via a knight move from {{from}} in the direction {{dir}}.
MOVE.anache_man: {{player}} moved a group of size {{count}} from {{from}} in the direction {{dir}}.

byte.full: {{player}} moved a full stack from {{from}} to {{to}}.

MOVE.collision: {{player}} tried to move from {{from}} to {{to}} but couldn't because of a collision.
MOVE.entrapment_roamer_jump: {{player}} moved a roamer from {{from}} to {{to}}, jumping over {{jumped}}.
MOVE.gess_one: {{player}} moved a 3x3 piece containing {{count}} stone from {{from}} to {{to}}.
MOVE.gess_other: {{player}} moved a 3x3 piece containing {{count}} stones from {{from}} to {{to}}.
MOVE.orb_2S: {{player}} moved a split spheroid from {{from}} to {{to}}.
MOVE.volo_one: {{player}} moved a flock of 1 bird from {{from}} in the direction {{how}}.
MOVE.volo_other: {{player}} moved a flock of {{count}} birds from {{from}} in the direction {{how}}.

NULLIFY_CLAIM: Towers may not be claimed on the last turn of the game. The claim at {{where}} was nullified.

ORIENT.nowhat: {{player}} turned a piece at {{where}} to face {{facing}}.

PASS.asli: {{player}} took an opposing piece from the prison and passed their turn.
PASS.entropy: {{player}} chose not to move any pieces this turn.

PIE.unlur: {{player}} has passed to be the Y player.

PLACE.armadas_1: {{player}} placed a small ship and named it {{name}}.
PLACE.armadas_2: {{player}} placed a medium ship and named it {{name}}.
PLACE.armadas_3: {{player}} placed a large ship and named it {{name}}.
PLACE.chase: The chamber spit out a {{what}} at {{where}}.
PLACE.mine: {{player}} placed one of their own pieces at {{where}}.
PLACE.nex: {{player}} placed a piece of their colour at {{where}}.
PLACE.orb: {{player}}'s orb generator created an orb at {{where}}.
PLACE.spire_player: {{player}} placed a ball of their colour at {{where}}.
PLACE.spooky: Spooky has entered the board at {{where}}.
PLACE.strands_initial: {{player}} placed a piece on a space labelled 2 at {{where}}.
PLACE.streetcar_11: A height-1 ORANGE building was placed at {{where}}.
PLACE.streetcar_12: A height-2 ORANGE building was placed at {{where}}.
PLACE.streetcar_13: A height-3 ORANGE building was placed at {{where}}.
PLACE.streetcar_21: A height-1 YELLOW building was placed at {{where}}.
PLACE.streetcar_22: A height-2 YELLOW building was placed at {{where}}.
PLACE.streetcar_23: A height-3 YELLOW building was placed at {{where}}.
PLACE.streetcar_31: A height-1 BLACK building was placed at {{where}}.
PLACE.streetcar_32: A height-2 BLACK building was placed at {{where}}.
PLACE.streetcar_33: A height-3 BLACK building was placed at {{where}}.
PLACE.streetcar_41: A height-1 WHITE building was placed at {{where}}.
PLACE.streetcar_42: A height-2 WHITE building was placed at {{where}}.
PLACE.streetcar_43: A height-3 WHITE building was placed at {{where}}.
PLACE.tumbleweed: {{player}} placed a stack of size {{count}} at {{where}}.
PLACE.upperhand_chain: A ball of {{whose}} was placed at {{where}}.

PROMOTE.lielow: {{player}} has a new king crowned at {{where}}.
PROMOTE.mchess: A {{into}} was created as a result.
PROMOTE.orb_12: {{player}} promoted an orb to a spheroid at {{where}}.
PROMOTE.orb_13: {{player}} promoted an orb to a globe at {{where}}.
PROMOTE.orb_23: {{player}} promoted spheroid to a globe at {{where}}.

REMOVE.entrapment_self: {{player}} chose to retain their own roamer at {{how}}, removing the roamer at {{where}}.
REMOVE.entrapment_opponent: {{player}} chose to retain the opponent's roamer at {{how}}, removing the roamer at {{where}}.
REMOVE.fourinarow_n: {{player}} cleared a line, shifting the pieces on the board upwards.
REMOVE.fourinarow_s: {{player}} cleared a line, shifting the pieces on the board downwards.
REMOVE.fourinarow_w: {{player}} cleared a line, shifting the pieces on the board leftwards.
REMOVE.fourinarow_e: {{player}} cleared a line, shifting the pieces on the board rightwards.
REMOVE.fourinarow_nw: {{player}} cleared two lines, shifting the pieces on the board upwards and leftwards.
REMOVE.fourinarow_ne: {{player}} cleared two lines, shifting the pieces on the board upwards and rightwards.
REMOVE.fourinarow_sw: {{player}} cleared two lines, shifting the pieces on the board downwards and leftwards.
REMOVE.fourinarow_se: {{player}} cleared two lines, shifting the pieces on the board downwards and rightwards.
REMOVE.spook_drop_one: {{player}} removed a ball at {{where}}, dropping 1 ball from {{how}}.
REMOVE.spook_drop_other: {{player}} removed a ball at {{where}}, dropping {{count}} balls from {{how}}.
REMOVE.volo: {{player}} chose to retain the region at {{how}}, removing {{num}} opponent's birds.

SELECT.slyde_fixed_self: {{player}} changed the state of their own piece at {{where}} from mobile to fixed.
SELECT.slyde_mobile_self: {{player}} changed the state of their own piece at {{where}} from fixed to mobile.
SELECT.slyde_fixed_opponent: {{player}} changed the state of their opponent's piece at {{where}} from mobile to fixed.
SELECT.slyde_mobile_opponent: {{player}} changed the state of their opponent's piece at {{where}} from fixed to mobile.
SELECT.spree: {{player}} handed a ball of colour {{who}} to the opponent.

SET.fnap_circles: The circle tile at {{where}} is isolated.

SOW.general_one: {{player}} sowed seeds from the following pit: {{pits}}.
SOW.general_other: {{player}} sowed seeds from the following pits: {{pits}}.

SWAP.nex_neutral: {{player}} swapped a neutral piece at {{where}} to a piece of their colour.
SWAP.nex: {{player}} swapped a piece of their colour at {{where}} to a neutral piece.

TAKE.chase: A {{what}} was fed to the chamber.
TAKE.streetcar_1: {{player}} took an ORANGE housing limit from {{from}}.
TAKE.streetcar_2: {{player}} took a YELLOW housing limit from {{from}}.
TAKE.streetcar_3: {{player}} took a BLACK housing limit from {{from}}.
TAKE.streetcar_4: {{player}} took a WHITE housing limit from {{from}}.
TAKE.tablero: {{player}} took one of their checkers from the stack at {{from}}.
